caption:
The photograph is a close-up portrait of a woman. She is visible from the chest upwards and is slightly turned to her right, giving the viewer a three-quarter view of her face. She has long, dark hair that is parted down the middle and frames her face. She has a gentle and relaxed expression, with a soft smile and her eyes slightly directed away from the camera towards her right.

Her skin is light, and she is wearing minimal makeup. She is dressed in a light-colored, turtleneck undergarment covered partially by a pale pink, knitted sweater. The background of the photograph is plain and off-white, focusing attention on her.

The lighting in the photograph is soft, creating a calm and warm feeling. The image captures a natural and candid moment, contributing to a serene and contemplative atmosphere.
title: "Ms"
